caller_intent: The caller, Aníllo, seeks assistance in obtaining insurance for a company they've contracted with and specifically requests to speak with Jessica, the only Spanish-speaking commercial agent at the agency.
resolution_steps: Agent informs caller that Jessica is unavailable today but will return on Monday.
Agent suggests contacting the office on Monday at 9:00 AM to speak with Jessica.
Caller agrees to follow up on Monday and thanks the agent.
summary: A caller from North Lila requested assistance with commercial insurance and specifically asked to speak with Jessica, the Spanish-speaking agent. The agent informed them Jessica would return on Monday at 9:00 AM and arranged a follow-up call. The caller agreed to contact back on Monday.
